content: Dr. Jan Halper-Hayes sits on a Department of Defense task forcehttps://rumble.com/v35g4jy--dr-jan-halper-hayes.html

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Like a snake with its head cut off, it still wiggles in the courts of the various States, and in other areas of the State governments.
